abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32529218, pmid32568070, pmid32543119, pmid32574369, pmid32558620, pmid32569363, pmid32567979, pmid32567872, pmid32569357, pmid32568665, pmid32542934, pmid32533071, pmid32520340, pmid32543751, pmid32525856, pmid32574154, pmid32574177, pmid32552178, pmid32552622, pmid32510598, pmid32569372, pmid32530531, pmid32546901, pmid32536989, pmid32516817, pmid32553350, pmid32519256, pmid32552522, pmid32555134, pmid32568013, pmid32529015, pmid32569002, pmid32549077, pmid32573658, pmid32543675
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.06.24
